channel.title: Comments on: Poor, Poor Pitiful Paladin

item.title: By: World of Warcraft Drama » i guess im a bit shy when it comes to being in groups with people i don’t even know
item.dc:creator: World of Warcraft Drama » i guess im a bit shy when it comes to being in groups with people i don’t even know
item.description: [...] Found over at AFK Gamer (the greatest WoW blog out there, and a must read for any raider). Socks from Jaedenar posts, begging for help under the subject, “im a girl and im new to WoW.” Only, they do it from their male 60 pally by mistake, complete with pally sig and ctprofile link. my character is lvl 22 right now..human rogue and im in re-ridge. i did all the easier solo quests and all i have left in re-ridge are the harder group quests. i guess im a bit shy when it comes to being in groups with people i dont even know so should i continue to complete those quests? or should i go to darkshirt and start doing solo quests there? [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Found over at AFK Gamer (the greatest WoW blog out there, and a must read for any raider). Socks from Jaedenar posts, begging for help under the subject, “im a girl and im new to WoW.” Only, they do it from their male 60 pally by mistake, complete with pally sig and ctprofile link. my character is lvl 22 right now..human rogue and im in re-ridge. i did all the easier solo quests and all i have left in re-ridge are the harder group quests. i guess im a bit shy when it comes to being in groups with people i dont even know so should i continue to complete those quests? or should i go to darkshirt and start doing solo quests there? […]

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: I put him in the time-out room for now, Big. I don't mind sneaky ads, as long as they include some gold in my Warcraft mailbox.
item.content:encoded: I put him in the time-out room for now, Big. I don’t mind sneaky ads, as long as they include some gold in my Warcraft mailbox.
